FlowDefinition.description: Created as a part of 2023 R1 enhancements (US-740). This flow triggers when an Annual Match Deliverable record is created or updated and copies the value from the "Amount Matched by Donor" formula field to the "Amount Matched by Donor ($)" numeric field in order for it to be used in Challenge Match Roll-Up fields.
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: Annual Challenge Match Deliverable --> Update Numeric Field for Roll-Up
